altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

title.en: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~Akuma no Niidzuma~

altTitles.ja: 願いを叶えてもらおうと悪魔を召喚したけど、可愛かったので結婚しました　～悪魔の新妻～

altTitles.en: I Summoned the Devil to Grant Me a Wish, but I Married Her Instead Since She Was Adorable ~My New Devil Wife~

altTitles.es-la: Conjuré al diablo para que me cumpliera un deseo, pero me casé con ella porque ella era adorable ~Mi nueva esposa diabólica~
Invoqué al diablo para hacer realidad mi deseo, pero era muy hermosa, así que me casé con ella ~ Mi nueva esposa es el diablo ~

altTitles.vi: Tôi triệu hồi ác quỷ để thực hiện điều ước, nhưng tôi lại muốn cưới cô ấy vì cổ quá xinh đẹp ~ Cô vợ ác quỷ~

altTitles.ru: Я вызвал демонессу, чтобы она исполнила мое желание, но вместо этого женился на ней, потому что она слишком очаровательна~ Моя новая жена Демонесса~

description.en: Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish. He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind, to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand and they go on to future adventures together.
description.ja: 傭兵ギルドに属するテオ・アスペルは、弱すぎるゆえに、 色々なパーティに入ったり追い出されたりを繰り返していた。強くなろうと思い、なんでも願いを叶えてくれるという悪魔を召喚することにするが……。
description.es-la: Un aventurero joven y huérfano trata de conjurar al diablo para obtener ayuda con su disciplina, pues sus habilidades son pocas. El diablo viene en forma de una bella que le ofrece un deseo. Tal fue su enamoramiento con su apariencia que le pide la primera cosa que le vino a la mente, que sea su esposa. Sonrojada, ella acepta su pedido sorpresivo y se dedican a aventurar juntos.
description.pt-br: Theo Aspel, que pertence a guilda de mercenarios, estava entrando e saindo de várias equipes repetidamente por ser muito fraco. Um dia desejando se tornar mais forte ele consegue invocar o diabo que concede qualquer desejo. No momento em que se deparou com o diabo a vontade de "ficar forte" desapareceu e ao ser questionado pelo Diabo sobre seu desejo, Theo responde "Por favor se case comigo!" Conheça a história de um menino herbívoro e da garota diabo carnívora que se tornam um casal e vivem felizes enquanto fazem bagunça por onde passa.

altTitles.ja: 救済の教室

description.en: Makoto Noda, a run-of-the-mill Japanese teacher, endures ridicule from his students while struggling to manage a classroom on the verge of collapse. On a fateful day, a misunderstanding leads to a slap from a PE teacher, causing him to hit his head on the corner of a desk and lose consciousness. When he awakens, he finds himself facing a mysterious window. As he completes them, his real-life stats improve and he also acquires special items...! With his newfound ability, can Noda save the failing school from ruin?

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん
Charao-kun to Seiso-chan

altTitles.ja-ro: #Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachide wa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: #クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.ja: 盗掘王

description.en:
The God’s Tombs started to appear around the world. Due to the relics within these tombs, many were able to wield these legendary power for themselves, while others became enslaved to these users. However, a Tomb Raider appears with the purpose of robbing these relics. The Tomb Raider King. “God damn it! Did that bastard already loot this place as well?!” What you own belongs to me. What I own definitely belongs to me. This is the story of a revived Tomb Raider who will do whatever he can to claim all the tombs and relics for himself! 

---
- [Official Web Novel Translation <English>](https://www.wuxiaworld.com/novel/tomb-raider-king)
description.fr: 2025, Terre, des tombeaux font leur apparition partout dans le monde. Les reliques qu’ils contiennent donnent des pouvoirs incroyables aux fous qui réussissent à les piller. Dans le futur, ce seront ces individus qui domineront la planète. Comment notre héros le sait-il ? Il l’a déjà vécu. Maintenant qu’il est de retour dans le passé, il va utiliser son savoir pour ne pas revivre les mêmes tragédies !
description.id:
Dunia telah berubah. Kemunculan pusara dan relikui misterius membuat jagat porak-poranda. Kini hanya pengguna Relikui yang bisa bertahan. 

Awalnya Seo Jooheon bekerja pada penguasa. Namun, dedikasi luar biasanya malah dibalas dengan pengkhianatan. Sebuah insiden pun membawanya kembali ke masa lalu, sekarang Seo Jooheon punya kesempatan kedua untuk mengubah nasibnya. 

Inilah perjalanan Seo Jooheon menjadi Raja Penjarah Pusara!
description.ja:
世界各地に現れた謎の「墓」。その中には遺物と呼ばれる存在がいた。遺物は人間に異能力を与え、その力を手に入れたある者は巨万の富を手に入れ、ある者は世界を我が物にしようと企んでいた。遺物によって変わり始めた世界…そんなある日、嵐の如く現れ、次々と遺物を奪っていく者がいた。人々は彼をこう呼んだ。「盗掘王」と。凄惨な死から蘇った復讐の化身が繰り広げる痛快異能力アクション大作！

description.ko:
현대에 출몰한 신의 무덤.
유물로 영웅의 능력을 쓰게 된 사람들, 부를 얻게 된 사람들.

그리고 그 유물을 털어가는 의문의 도굴꾼이 나타났다.

도굴왕.

"아이씨, 미치겠네. 여기도 또 그자식이 다 털어 갔냐!"

네 것도 내 것. 내 건 당연히 내 것.
다시 살아난 도굴꾼, 그가 세상 모든 무덤을 접수하기 시작한다!

description.ru:
Божественные гробницы в современном мире. Люди, которые используют способности героев при помощи реликвий и люди, получившие богатства. А также загадочный расхититель гробниц, появившиеся из ниоткуда. 

«Ах, с ума сойти! И здесь он тоже все обчистил!» 

То, что было твоим – моё. То, что было моим, естественно, моё! 

Вновь возродившийся расхититель гробниц начал охоту на все реликвии этого мира!
description.th:
สุสานมากมายได้ปรากฎขึ้นบนโลก

ของของฉันคือของของฉัน ของของคนอื่นก็คือของฉันด้วย!

description.zh: 2025年世界各处惊现古墓，获得墓中“宝物”之人便能获得先人的异能。全世界为获得宝物而疯狂。无往不利盗墓者徐浩钧，在一次任务中落入陷阱，不幸丧命。然而他带着前世的记忆，回到了一切开始的地方。虽然失去了宝物，却获得了“系统”。这是重启的新生，还是命运的捉弄。在系统加持下，这一世徐浩钧能否告别蝼蚁的人生，登上王之宝座？
description.zh-hk:
自古墓降臨現世後，
人們便能藉由文物使用特殊能力，並獲得財富。

其中還出了個專搶文物的神祕盜墓賊。

盜墓王!

「可惡!這裡又被他搜刮一空了嗎!」

你的就是我的，而我的還是我的。

這個重生的盜墓賊，即將開始接收世上所有古墓!

altTitles.ja: 璃寛皇国ひきこもり瑞兆妃伝 日々後宮を抜け出し、有能官吏やってます。

description.en:
A reclusive princess who rarely shows her face, and a competent official who rose to the second highest position in the Ministry of Civil Affairs in just five years. The story of a princess who dons male garb and uses her two identities to solve the country's crises one after another! 

A Japanese girl, Saya, wanders into a Chinese-style world where black is considered a noble color reserved for emperors and queens, and is picked up by the emperor of the Rikan Empire to become his consort. However, she finds her life too boring, so she escapes from the palace, dresses as a man, and starts working as a government official... and before she knows it, she's promoted to the top! She hides the fact that she has black hair and uses her two faces, "reclusive queen" and "competent official," to solve problems that threaten the court and the country!

title.en: Kimi ga Inaku Natta Fuyu no Umi

altTitles.ja: キミがいなくなった冬の海

altTitles.en: The Winter Sea Where You Are Gone

description.en:
Winter sea surrounds the moment of the high school graduation.
Sena and Shu, two classmates who exchanged words just once, and who followed different paths for about two years, reunite in front of the very same sea.
They spent a year together as if they wanted to fill in the gaps inside each other's hearts.
One day, without having opportunity to express their feelings and maintaining an ambiguous relationship, the accident happened.
Shu wakes up at the hospital and runs to find Sena, the latter calls him by his last name, "Kutsuna,"... Why now after all this time?
If you forget our year together, does it mean it is the end of our love as well...?

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.
description.pt-br:
Lorem, uma demônio infame e temível, teve que se estabelecer por causa de Gospel, seu filho. Embora não pareça, ela é uma mãe amorosa e zelosa, mas permanece temível tanto para os companheiros demônios quanto para os espectadores humanos, porque mantém a terrível reputação de sua juventude selvagem e terrível dos anos anteriores.

Pelo bem do amor maternal, ela tem que perseverar, aprender e prosperar num mundo onde não está sozinha. Pelo bem do Evangelho e do seu futuro.

Sinta o Amor nele!

description.vi: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Công chúa Elna từ vương quốc Arthurtual và Hoàng tử Thjalfi từ vương quốc đối địch Ansuz. Tình yêu, phiêu lưu và chiến tranh, một bộ truyện mang đậm phong cách Gibili rất hay mà bạn không nên bỏ qua.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.en: Duke, That Man Is My Real Brother

altTitles.ja: 公爵様、その人は私のお兄ちゃんです！

altTitles.zh: 那个男人是我亲哥哥，公爵

altTitles.es-la: Duque Él Es Mi Verdadero Hermano

description.en:
In a fantasy novel, I suddenly became Astel, the younger sister who never appeared. While my brother Cassian is fighting for revenge of the clan, it is my duty to find and deal with the final villain that remains unrevealed even at the end of the series! In order to do that, I must first enter the mansion of the northern duke, where the traitors of the family are hiding. But somehow, I became the 'mate' of duke Anais, a beast and a prime candidate for the ultimate villain. Besides...

"Kiss me now, Astel."

In order to live, I have to communicate with my 'mate' every day, but there’s no such thing in the original!

"Shouldn’t we go see the ocean you like today?"

"I-I don’t think I can. I have to go see Mr. Cassian today."

The duke gritted his teeth with a cold face. I was a little scared when I saw this look on his face. Maybe he’s teething? Because he’s a wild beast!

===

The other day, when I was living under the duke’s care. My brother, Cassian, left his son in my care for a while. However, it seems the duke has been entangled in a huge misunderstanding.

"They will become our child."

"What...?"

"Cassian Gray will disappear from this world right now, so you won't be his bride anymore."

Yes...? Since when did I become Cassian Gray’s bride?

---

altTitles.fr: L'héroine d'un jeu otome survie en devenant la plus forte

altTitles.en: Strongest Survival with an Otome Game's Heroine

description.en:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she’s determined to carve her own path.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
description.ja:
剣と魔法の世界シエルで孤児として生きていた少女アーリシア。
ある日、彼女は自分が“乙女ゲームのヒロイン”であると知ってしまう。
両親の死さえ単にストーリーの一部だったのだ。
アーリシアはヒロインの役割を「くだらない」と一刀両断すると、冒険者『アリア』を名乗り、次第に複数の武器と魔法を操る「殺戮（さつりく）の灰かぶり姫」へと成長していく！
だが、“悪役令嬢”の護衛依頼を受けたことで、気付かぬ間に貴族同士が争うゲームの舞台に巻き込まれていき――？
「私は“私”だ。ゲームの登場人物じゃない！」
武器を作れ！　技を鍛えろ！
強敵との戦いに生き残り、乙女ゲームをぶち壊せ！
戦うヒロインが魅せる、壮絶＆爽快な異世界バトルファンタジー！

---

description.ru:
В мире меча и магии, что звался Сиэль, жила сирота по имени Алисия.
Однажды она узнала, что является героиней отомэ-игры, в которой даже смерть её родителей была лишь частью сценария. Расценив положение героини полнейшим абсурдом, она решительно его отвергнула. Она переродилась как авантюристка Ария, и шаг за шагом мастерски овладела широким арсеналом оружия и магии. Её величали «Пепельная принцесса резни»! Однако, взявшись за задание по охране «злодейки», Алисия, опомниться не успев, обнаружила себя втянутой в конфликты знати…

«Я - это я, а не персонаж какой-то игры!»

Выковать оружие! Закалить тело!
Выжить в борьбе против могущественных врагов и разнести эту чёртову отомэ-игру!
Захватывающая битва нашей героини в величественном мире меча и магии!

天使とアクト!!

description.en:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival… as the female lead?!

Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

altTitles.vi: Nàng Juliet ở trường nội trú

altTitles.ja: 寄宿学校のジュリエット

description.en: Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…
description.it:
Juliet Persia e Romio Inuzuka sono a capo di due dormitori rivali presso l'accademia privata Dahlia, in cui risiedono gli studenti appartenenti a due paesi differenti, i "Black Doggy" e i "White Cat". Le due fazioni sono in guerra tra loro per contendersi il controllo dell'isola in cui vivono. Juliet e Romio si dimostrano agli occhi dei loro compagni di dormitorio come acerrimi nemici, ma in realtà sono segretamente innamorati l'uno dell'altra e costretti a mantenere nascosta la loro relazione per non subire ripercussioni.  
  
  
 **Links:**   
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3628803)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/yousukekaneda)
description.ru:
История проходит в школе-интернате Далия, престижной школе на изолированном острове, где учатся студенты из Восточной страны и Западного княжества. Враждебные отношения соседних стран не меняются и внутри школы — день изо дня между учениками происходят стычки из-за взаимной неприязни. К этой и без того напряжённой ситуации добавляется то, что Ромио Инудзука, лидер первокурсников из общежития Восточной страны, известного как «Чёрные собаки», и Джульетта Персия, лидер первокурсников из общежития Западного княжества, известного как «Белые кошки», тайно влюблены друг в друга!
Об этих отношениях, невзирая ни на какие обстоятельства, абсолютно никто не должен узнать!
description.vi: Inuzuka Romio và Juliet Persia đang hẹn hò, song vì xuất thân từ hai đất nước đối địch nên họ không thể công khai mối quan hệ dù học chung một trường. Nhưng tình hình đã có sự thay đổi nhờ Hasuki - người bạn thơ ấu đem lòng thương Inuzuka!
description.pt-br: Juliet Persia e Inuzuka Romio são arqui-inimigos. Eles lideram dois dormitórios de ensino médio de dois países rivais. Ambas as facções estão decididas a derrotar a outra para ganhar o controle sobre a ilha que elas têm para compartilhar. Por baixo do exterior de rivalidade, no entanto, Persia e Inuzuka anseiam por amor e paz para seu relacionamento em desenvolvimento...

altTitles.th: อาร์ติแฟกต์ถล่มดันเจี้ยน

description.en:
A dungeon-guiding gig goes sideways for explorer Stetch Atelier when the prince who hired him tricks him into activating a fatal curse. But instead of staying dead, Stetch is resurrected by a sentient artifact that offers him a deal that may help him get his revenge. To hold up his end of the bargain, Stetch sets off on a long journey of raiding dungeons, slaying monsters, and making new enemies and friends along the way.

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/dungeons-and-artifacts/list?title_no=2933)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/dixiachengfuchouji/list?title_no=1584)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/artifact/list?title_no=2499)
description.ko:
던전은 사람의 마음을 홀린다. 

죽어 나간 생명의 수만큼 자신을 강화하고, 
더욱 많은 희생양들을 유인하기 위해 
달콤한 미끼―아티팩트를 생성한다. 

던전에서 계략에 의해 목숨을 잃은 스테치 아텔리어. 
죽음의 문턱을 넘어 두 번째 기회를 거머쥔 그는, 
일생 일대의 복수를 위한 기나긴 여정을 시작한다. 

아티팩트의 저주를 없애는 희생양에서 
재앙급 아티팩트 ‘메멘토 모템’의 공생자로! 

“내가 이 아티팩트를 만진 순간 너희도 끝장난 거야!”

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/dungeons-and-artifacts/list?title_no=2933)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/dixiachengfuchouji/list?title_no=1584)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/artifact/list?title_no=2499)
description.ru:
Подло убитый и обкраденный исследователь подземелий жаждет мести. Подземелья завлекают человеческие разумы, используют наживку и артефакты, чтобы заманить больше жертв. Бесчестно убитый Стич Ательер на пороге смерти получает второй шанс и встаёт на путь отмщения. "Я приду по вашу душу, когда завладею этими артефактами"

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/dungeons-and-artifacts/list?title_no=2933)

description.th:
ดันเจี้ยนที่เพิ่มความแข็งแกร่งให้กับตัวมันเองด้วยพลังของสิ่งมีชีวิตทั้งหลายที่ล้มตาย ที่ใจกลางนั่นจะมี "อาร์ติแฟกต์" ซึ่งเป็นหัวใจของดันเจี้ยนฝังอยู่

description.zh:
最强的我被利用后惨死！
遇神器重生，带我复仇！
当邪气与厄运之气凝结到最大限度时，无论在何处，都会瞬间形成一座地下城。地下城藏有核心神器，越危险且时间越长的地下城的神器就越厉害。探险家斯特治·阿特里亚在地下城帮助博内吉亚王国三王子取得天王级神器后，却被三王子利用害死。斯特治弥留之际用血肉触发了神器，越过死亡门槛，神器与斯特治共生！当他获得第二次生命，他们漫长的复仇之旅开始了！

---

description.zh-hk:
「一旦我拿到這個神器，你們就完蛋了！」 含冤而死的地牢探險家x毀滅性神器，即將攜手上演一場復仇大劇！ 鬼門關前走一遭之後，史戴奇‧阿泰利爾成為了神器──「銘記死亡」的生命共同體，展開漫漫復仇路。

title.en: The Rogue Prince Is Secretly an Omega

altTitles.en: Hiding That the Crazy Prince Is an Omega
Hiding That the Damn Prince Is an Omega
Hiding That the Lout Prince Is an Omega

description.en: Prince Étienne de Frederick was born a dominant omega, but in a world where omegas can’t become the emperor, he must pretend to be a beta due to the empress’s greed. When his childhood friend, Grand Duke Rishar von Eckhart, returns after three years as a war hero, there’s no time to share a happy reunion as Rishar is a dominant alpha and his rival in the fight for the throne. The two continue to maintain a precarious relationship until, one day, Étienne has a sudden heat cycle, and Rishar finds out the truth. “Étienne de Frederick. You were... an omega?”
description.ko: "You... you're an omega?" Prince Etienne was born as a dominant omega, but he lives as a foolish prince pretending to be a beta. The Empress who covets the throne and abuses Etienne, the Emperor who neglects him and remains cold-hearted. Little by little, their support of him is slipping. Meanwhile, his childhood friend Richard returns to the palace as a war hero. Etienne should avoid him, who is a dominant alpha, but his heart is stirred as Richard continues to pay attention to him.

description.en:
An Assassin of the Murim Alliance that inherited the work of a Demonic Cult Leader.
He stands up after being down and out, and gets out into the Jianghu!
This is the incredible Jianghu journey of the world’s best Assassin, Lee Gwang.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: A Story in Which an Older Brother Becomes a Little Sister

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan ga Imouto ni naru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんが妹になる話

description.en: When I woke up in the morning, my brother became a sister! He thought they were swapped, but only he remains in his sister's form and they look identical!
description.fr: Quand je me suis réveillé un matin, mon frère est devenu ma sœur ! Il pensait qu'ils étaient échangés, mais lui seul change dans la forme de sa sœur et elles sont identiques !

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.ko:
세상 모두가 내공을 가질 수 있는 시대.
아직까진 고수라는 존재의 의미가 없지만,
세상 한편에선 옛 고서나 체계적인 연구로 인해 인간의 능력을 월등히
뛰어넘는 고수들이 만들어지고 있다.
​
세상에 공개된 내공수련법 이외에 다른 고서들이 있었고,...

description.en: ‘Quest Hero’ is a VR online game that has received attention worldwide. One day, one of their named users, ‘Harang’, was pulled into another world by an unknown sword-like object. No matter how hard he tried, he wasn’t able to log out and was even attacked… Not only did he feel ‘real’ pain, he also meet the ‘real’ Yuta instead of the npc Yuta. Would Harang be able to complete the ‘7th Quest and return back to the real world safely?! The journey of the ‘Adolescent Warrior’ who fell into an unknown world!
description.ko:
세계적으로 주목받는 VR 온라인 게임, '퀘스트 히어로'.
이곳의 네임드 유저인 '하랑'은 알 수 없는 검은 형체에 이끌려 다른 세계로 끌려간다.
아무리 시도해 봐도 로그아웃은 되지 않고, 설상가상으로 공격까지 당하게 되는데...
'진짜'로 아픔이 느껴지는 것도 모자라, NPC 유타가 아닌 '진짜' 유타까지 만난다.
과연 하랑은 '7번의 퀘스트'를 모두 완료하고, 무사히 집으로 돌아갈 수 있을까!?
낯선 세계에 떨어진 '소년 검사' 하랑의 여정이 시작된다!
description.ru: "Quest Hero" – это очень успешная онлайн-игра в виртуальной реальности. Один из игроков с ником «Харан» оказался втянут в другой мир–мир игры.. Он не верил в реальность происходящего, пытался выйти, но всё было тщетно. Мало того, что ему не удалось вернуться домой, он подвергся нападению... Харан смог прочувствовать настоящую боль, а также встретил NPC Юты, которая была удивительно похожа на живого человека. Сможет ли Харан завершить квест и благополучно вернуться в реальный мир?! Это путешествие молодого мечника, который попал в неизвестный мир!

title.en: Welcome, It's Your First Time Seeing a Cute Villain, Isn't It?

description.en:
[Novel Description]

I went back to my hometown after accepting my dying fate, but I learned about my birth secret that was like dog shit.

That I was actually Sophia Herman, the granddaughter of Grand Duke Herman, the empire’s greatest evil family.

The woman that I believed to be my mother was actually a kidnapper.

Hercio Herman, a man without blood or tears and my grandfather, told my kidnapper to do whatever she wanted with me.

[But I couldn’t bring myself to kill you…I’m sorry. Please be happy, Lisian…]

It sounded like crap.

I crumpled my mom’s, no, my kidnapper’s letter.

At the worst moment of my life, I returned to when I was a 9-year-old.

In order to escape a miserable death, I went to Herman Duchy, the family who abandoned me and the greatest evil family in the empire.

With plans to take advantage of them, save my life, and then escape again!

title.en: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma

altTitles.en: The Secret of AiPri - Full Color Review 4-Koma

altTitles.ja: ひみつのアイプリ フルカラーおさらい4コマ

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

The story of a breath-taking battle to become the strongest of the Jianghu.
A man and a woman’s paths crossing into destined love.

L'histoire d'une bataille à couper le souffle pour devenir le plus fort du Jianghu.
Les chemins d'un homme et d'une femme se croisent et se transforment en amour.

강호 제일 용부의 권좌를 차지하기 위한 숨 가쁜 암투.
그 위에 엇갈린 두 남녀의 운명과 절대절명의 사랑.

Са Гонун - талантливый воин, желающий обрести большую силу и выбравший путь к борьбе за трон самого могущественного воина. Молодой парень становится служащим, где и начинает свой рост вместе с одним парнем и девушкой, чьи судьбы переплелись и чья любовь пришла к абсолютному отчаянию.

description.en: Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

altTitles.ja-ro: ゆるふわ農家の文字化けスキル ~異世界でカタログ通販やってます~
Yurufuwa Nouka no Mojibake Skill ~Isekai de Catalog Tsuuhan Yattemasu~

altTitles.pt-br: Agricultura no modo cheat em outro mundo

description.en:
Tatsuya, a 29-year-old bachelor, gets accidentally summoned to another world and obtains [Agricultural Skills]. 

In order to survive, he starts a vegetable garden in a secluded forest. He thought that his life in another world would be extremely difficult, but the ingredients in this other world were delicious and the crops he grew on his own were also very delicious! Furthermore, he's also very happy with the dishes he made with Japanese seasonings! 

(Typical. Rice and sake are going to be a staple apparently, but you guys know the drill. )

Besides, if there are beautiful brides, isn't it okay if he lives in this other world? Loose and fluffy, a relaxing other world harem life!
description.es: Tatsuya, un soltero de 29 años, es invocado a otro mundo por alguna razón y debido a eso logra despertar [Habilidades agrícolas]. Inicia un huerto para sobrevivir en un bosque remoto. "Creo que vivir en un mundo diferente es extremadamente difícil, y aunque los ingredientes en él suelen ser deliciosos, mis propios productos agrícolas también son muy deliciosos. Además, estoy muy satisfecho con los platos elaborados con condimentos japoneses, el arroz y sake son deliciosos. Y si hay novias hermosas, ¿no hace que este mundo sea aun mejor?" ¡Viviendo una vida relajada y acaramelada con su harem en un mundo diferente!
description.pt-br: Um homem solteiro de 29 anos é invocado para outro mundo. recebendo uma habilidade de agricultura level 1. Crie uma casa, faça uma horta e viva uma tranquila vida isolada na floresta. Com bebidas e comidas deliciosas de sua colheita e lindas garotas, não tem coisa melhor.

title.en: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I'd Rather Raise a Cat

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Villainess, but Why Did I Become a Cat Butler Instead?
Even Though I Possessed a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat

altTitles.ru: Мной завладел злодей, но я всё ещё хочу вырастить кота

description.en:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

คุณชายไม่เอาไหนแห่งตระกูลเคานต์

description.en:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?
description.fr: Réincarné dans un roman, c’est le rêve non? Pas tout à fait, surtout quand on est devenu une ordure qui se fait tabasser par le héros au début de l’histoire… Vu qu’il sait ce qui va se passer, pas question de se faire taper dessus! Et puis, si au passage il peut en profiter pour se la couler douce…
description.id:
Saat membuka mata, aku sudah berada di dalam dunia novel.
Tidak hanya itu, aku masuk ke dalam tubuh seorang tuan muda dari keluarga Count yang terkenal sebagai pembuat onar.
Tetapi, aku tidak bisa menjadi seorang pembuat onar begitu saja kan?
description.it: Quando Kim aprì gli occhi non poteva credere a ciò che stava vedendo. Si era ritrovato inspiegabilmente all’interno di un libro che stava leggendo. Ora lui è Cale Henituse, un antagonista del racconto. Il problema più grande però, è che lui non aveva finito di leggere il libro. Quindi ora lui vive il suo personaggio e gli eventi della storia per come se li ricorda. Ma cosa dovrà fare Cale Henituse una volta superato il punto dove Kim si era fermato?
description.ja:
目を開けると、そこは小説の中だった。 暴君として名高い伯爵家の令息の体に憑依してしまい…!?

description.ko:
눈을 떠보니 소설 속이었다.
그컷도 망나니로 유명한 백작가의 도련님 몸으로.......
그리고, 소설 속에서 나를 박살 냈던 
막강한 주인공 최한이 곧 여기로 온다.
description.pl:
Gdy otworzyłem oczy, znalazłem się w świecie z powieści „Narodziny bohatera”.

Książka ta opisuje przygody Choi Hana - licealisty, który przeniósł się z Ziemi do innego świata - oraz wielu innych bohaterów. Ja znalazłem się w ciele śmiecia z hrabskiej rodziny, na której to terytorium położona jest wioska, w której mieszka Choi Han.

Po tym, jak wioska zostaje zaatakowana przez tajemniczych napastników, główny bohater powiadamia o zdarzeniu syna hrabiego, lecz ten go zbywa.
Następnie ów syn zostaje zbity na kwaśne jabłko.

„To… dość problematyczne.”
description.ru:
Я очнулся в романе, в теле молодого наследника графства, прославленного не без помощи его жестокого выродка.  
Но я не собираюсь быть таким же ублюдком.
description.th:
เมื่อ 'คิมรกซู' ต้องไปอยู่ในร่างอันธพาลตัวร้ายในเรื่องอย่าง 'เคล'
เขาจึงตั้งปณิธานกับตัวเองว่าจะต้องมีชีวิตรอด ไม่ถูก 'ชเวฮัน' ตัวเอกของเรื่อง อัดจนเละเหมือนในนิยาย
และเคลยังตัองร่วมเดินทางผจญภัยไปกับตัวละครในเรื่อง 'กำเนิดวีรชน'
เขาจะมีชีวิตรอด ไม่เจ็บป่วย และใช้ชีวิตได้สงบสุขอย่างที่ต้องการหรือไม่

description.uk:
Коли я відкрив очі, я опинився в новелі.

[Народження героя] - новела, присвячений пригодам головного героя Чхве Хана, хлопчика старшої школи, якого перенесли в інший вимір із Землі, і який народжений як один з численних героїв континенту .
Я став частиною цього роману як старший син графа, сім'я, якого контролювала територію, де знаходиться перше село, яке відвідує Чхве Хань.

Чхве Хан змінюєть після того села, а після — всі її мешканці буди вбиті таємною організацією.

Більшою проблемою є той факт, що цей нікчемний покидьок, яким я став, не знає про те, що трапилося в селі, і насміхається над Чхве Ханом, лише щоб його побили.

"... Це стане проблемою"

Я відчуваю, що зі мною станеться щось серйозне.

Але варто спробувати зробити своє нове життя кращим.
description.zh: 一个出场5秒就下线的贵族混混，一个高冷霸气的英雄男主，穿成前者还马上要被高冷男主暴揍怎么办？呵，作为一个美貌废物，当然只能靠骚操作，抱大腿抢机遇努力在这个充斥着魔法，龙，狼族的大陆求生存！
description.pt-br: “Não posso continuar sendo um lixo pra sempre.” Após ler os 5 primeiros volumes da novel [O Nascimento de um Herói], Kim Rok-Soo dorme e acorda em outro mundo. Ele havia sido transportado para o mundo da novel no corpo de Cale Henituse, o lixo da família do conde Henituse e um nobre mimado que tinha sido espancado pelo protagonista no começo da história. Neste novo mundo cheio de perigo e magia, Cale Henituse (Kim Rok-Soo) deseja apenas viver uma vida tranquila e livre de problemas, mas as coisas nem sempre vão de acordo com o planejado…
description.zh-hk:
睜開眼就發現自己到了小說世界，
而且我還變成了赫赫有名的伯爵家混混少爺...
另外，小說裡那個
把我當成沙包揍的強大主角——崔漢，
很快就要抵達這裡了。

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

description.de:
Nachdem er 12 Jahre lang in einem Turm voller sich regenerierender Monster gefangen war, ist Hyeonu Kim mächtiger als so ziemlich jeder Mensch und jedes Monster auf der Erde. Endlich frei, ist er entschlossen, herauszufinden, wer hinter seiner Gefangenschaft steckt. Auch wenn das bedeutet, dass er Horden von Monstern töten muss - und dabei ganz nebenbei die Welt rettet.

description.en: After being trapped for 12 years in a tower full of regenerating monsters, Hyeonu Kim is more powerful than just about any human or monster on Earth. Now that he’s free, he’s determined to find out who was behind his imprisonment, even if that means he has to kill hordes of monsters -- and inadvertently save the world -- along the way.
description.es:
Después de pasar doce años atrapado en una torre llena de monstruos que se regeneran, Hyeonu Kim es más poderoso que prácticamente cualquier humano o monstruo del planeta. Ahora que recuperó la libertad, está decidido a descubrir quién estuvo detrás de su encarcelamiento, aunque eso implique matar hordas de monstruos y, sin darse cuenta, salvar el mundo.

altTitles.ja: THE LIVE〜未来からの日記〜

description.en:
"Only I can see the future in this deadly game."

Yoon-Jae leads an empty life after his wife and daughter are brutally murdered. One day, his journal reveals one mysterious sentence: "You can see them again."

Yoon-Jae is pulled into a parallel universe where everyone is a player in a lethal game, and the final survivor will be granted any wish. 

Desperate to be reunited with his family, will Yoon-Jae succeed in fighting his way in this hellish world to be the last one standing? 

---

description.ja:
主人公は連続殺人犯に妻と娘を殺害される。 毎日絶望的な日々を送りながら日記をつけていたが、ある日突然、未来の自分が書いた日記に書き換わり、そこには妻と娘にもう一度会えると書かれていた。 そして仮想世界に引き込まれた主人公は、愛する家族と再会できる日を願いながら必死にチュートリアルをクリアしていく。

description.ko:
불의의 사건으로 아내와 딸을 잃은 가장 윤재는 하루하루 절망에 빠져 살던 중, 미래의 자신이 보낸 일기장을 읽게 된다.

“아내와 딸을… 다시 만날 수 있다고?”

'이면 세계'의 '게임'을 이겨내는 자에게 주어지는 '성배', 그것을 사용하면 잃어버렸던 가족과 재회할 수 있다고 하는데…
강자만이 살아남는 잔혹한 세계에서 단 한 명, 미래를 아는 자가 된 윤재. 그는 그토록 바라던 소원을 이룰 수 있을까?

---

description.ru:
Юн Чжэ потерял свою жену и дочь в результате несчастного случая. Лишившись смысла жизни, он прожигает её напрасно. Единственным, что осталось в память о покойной супруги, был дневник, который, может и пригодиться в будущем. Есть ли вероятность того, что… Ему удастся встретиться со своей семьёй ещё раз?  
  
"Святой грааль" - главная награда игрока, который смог пройти "игру" и занять первое место. Если Юн Чжэ сумеет заполучить его, то его семья снова будет с ним. Однако, в жестоком мире, где правит лишь сила, главному герою придётся преодолеть не мало препятствий, чтобы достичь желаемого. Сможет ли Юн Чжэ стать сильнейшим игроком?

---

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！　憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal/volumes)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

altTitles.hu: Olyan Női Karakterként Kerülök Egy Másik Világba, Akinek Ugyan Vannak Különleges Képességei, De Mivel Egy Jelentéktelen Karakter Vagyok, Megpróbálok Nem Feltűnni És Békés Hétköznapi Életet Élni!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.es: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.hu:
Egy kimerült irodai dolgozó. Egy nap, amikor felébred, azt veszi észre, hogy egy másik világba került, és abban a női karakterben van, amelyet az általa játszott online játékban használt, Suzy néven. Bár kezdetben össze van zavarodva, támadásai hatalmas pusztító erővel bírnak, olyannyira, hogy még a hegyek alakját is megváltoztatja, és veszélyes vadállatokat űz a közeli faluba. Miközben segít Howardnak, a falusiak védelmezőjének, a vadállatok elleni küzdelemben, meghívást kap a faluba. Azonban...

Egy 32 éves férfi... egy online játék világában lánnyá válva próbál boldogulni!? Célja egy egyszerű, békés élet megteremtése a falusi környezetben. A kaland most kezdődik!
description.ja:
お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――。

32歳のおっさんが...ネトゲの世界で女の子として生きていく!? 目指せ庶民派スローライフ、開幕!!
description.es-la: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.pt-br: Um assalariado um pouco cansado. Um dia, ao acordar… ele se viu em outro mundo no corpo de uma personagem feminina, Susie, do MMORPG que ele gostava de jogar. Confuso, ele tentou um ataque… e fez todos os monstros fugirem para o lugar onde as pessoas vivem, com medo de seu poder avassalador que é capaz de destruir uma montanha. Depois disso, ele acabou salvando Howard, um tribuno local que convidou seu salvador para a vila, mas…

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?
